languages.text: Каждый {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} существо получает {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}токсичный урон{/g}. Каждый уровень плавящего яда сокращает число {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} на 1 и наносимый {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} на 10%.
languages.original_text: Each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} this creature suffers {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. Each stack of {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g} venom decreases {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} by −1 and all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by −10%.

traits.locale_text: Каждый {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} существо получает {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}токсичный урон{/g}. Каждый уровень плавящего яда сокращает число {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} на 1 и наносимый урон на 10%.

Каждый {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} существо получает {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}токсичный урон{/g}. Каждый уровень плавящего яда сокращает число {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} на 1 и наносимый урон на 10%.

traits.locale_text: Each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} this creature suffers {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. Each stack of melting venom decreases {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} by −1 and all damage by −10%.

Each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} this creature suffers {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. Each stack of {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g} venom decreases {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} by −1 and all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by −10%.

languages.text: この生物は毎{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒性ダメージ{/g}を受ける。{g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}溶解{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}毒{/g}のスタック1つにつきMPが−1%され、すべての{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が−10%される。
languages.original_text: Each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} this creature suffers {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. Each stack of {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g} venom decreases {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} by −1 and all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by −10%.

traits.locale_text: この生物は毎{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒性ダメージ{/g}を受ける。メルティング ヴェノムのスタック1つにつき{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が−1％され、全てのダメージが−10％される。

languages.text: 此生物每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}都会受到{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒素伤害{/g}。每层“溶解毒液”效果都会使{g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}1点，造成的所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低10%。
languages.original_text: Each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} this creature suffers {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. Each stack of {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g} venom decreases {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} by −1 and all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by −10%.

traits.locale_text: 此生物每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}都会受到{g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}毒性伤害{/g}。每层“溶解毒液”效果都会使{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}1点，造成的所有伤害降低10%。

languages.text: Cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, esta criatura sufre {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}daño tóxico{/g}. Cada acumulación de veneno de {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}derretimiento{/g} reduce los {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} en −1 y todo el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} en un −10 %.

Each stack of {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g} venom decreases {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} by −1 and all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by −10%.

traits.locale_text: Cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, esta criatura sufre {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}daño tóxico{/g}. Cada acumulación de veneno de derretimiento reduce los {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} en −1 y todo el daño en un −10 %.

languages.text: Bei jedem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} erleidet diese Kreatur {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}Giftschaden{/g}. Jeder Stapel {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}Schmelzgift{/g} verringert die {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} um −1 und {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} um −10 %.
languages.original_text: Each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} this creature suffers {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. Each stack of {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g} venom decreases {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} by −1 and all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by −10%.

traits.locale_text: In jedem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} erleidet diese Kreatur {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}Giftschaden{/g}. Jeder Stapel Schmelzgift verringert die {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} um -1 und jeglichen Schaden um -10 %.

languages.text: À chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, cette créature subit des {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}dégâts toxiques{/g}. Chaque cumul de Venin en {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}fusion{/g} réduit les {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} de 1 et tous les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de 10 %.

traits.locale_text: À chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, cette créature subit des {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}dégâts toxiques{/g}. Chaque cumul de Fusio-Venin réduit les {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} de -1 et tous les dégâts de -10 %.

languages.text: Bu yaratık, her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turda{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toksik hasara{/g} maruz kalır. {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}Eriten{/g} zehir etkisinin her birikimi, {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g}'yi 1 puan ve verilecek her türlü {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarı{/g} da %10 azaltır.
